data.title: 104.5 The Team ESPN Radio
data.text:
Thibodeau Takes T-Wolves Job

The Minnesota Timberwolves hired Tom Thibodeau as their new head coach and president of basketball operations on Wednesday. Thibodeau is a perfect hire for the T-Wolves. The T-Wolves are a young team with some great talent like Karl-Anthony Towns, Andrew Wiggins, and Zach LaVine...

Windhorst: "Knicks Not A Good Job"

The New York Knicks recently fired head coach Derek Fisher. Kurt Rambis now takes over a team that is engulfed in a major losing streak that is struggling to play together. Could Rambis be the long term fit for the Knicks and help turn the team around...

Mean Tweets – Timberwolves [VIDEO]

My favorite feature on the Jimmy Kimmel Live is "Mean Tweets." Something about athletes and famous people read the Tweets that people just randomly post about them makes me feel bad for them and laugh all at once. The Minnesota Timberwolves just did their own Mean Tweets and Karl Anthony Towns cracks me up...

The Knicks Eyeing Trade For Ricky Rubio

With the New York Knicks whiffing on free agents left and right this offseason, they may be looking to swing for the fences one more time before the NBA season rolls around. Reports have surfaced that the Knicks could be looking to land Minnesota Timberwolves point guard Ricky Rubio in a trade...

Minnesota Timberwolves Parody Miami Heat Harlem Shake [VIDEO]

I know, I know; you’re probably sick of these Harlem Shake videos. However, you really need to see the Minnesota Timberwolves poke fun at the Miami Heat.

JJ Barea Ejected For Cheap Shot On Ray Allen [VIDEO]

When you think of enforcers in the NBA, you don’t think of JJ Barea. However, the undersized point guard channeled his inner cheap-shot artist on Monday night.

Nash Heads to Los Angeles. Is Lin leaving to Houston?

NBA free agency takes no holiday as some huge moves were completed on this 4th of July. The biggest move was pulled off by the LA lakers who acquired 2 time MVP Steve Nash from division rival Phoenix in a sign and trade package. In exchange for Nash the Lakers send Phoenix 2-1st round draft picks and 2-2nd round picks...

Minnesota Timberwolves – “Tearing Up My Heart” [VIDEO]

The Minnesota Timberwolves awkwardly attempt to sing some 'N Sync karaoke. Kevin Love definitely doesn't have a future in music.
